overview:
Trevor Neilson is Managing Director at G2 Investment Group, Co-Founder of Global Philanthropy Group, and a private equity investor.

He has served as Director of Public Affairs for the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, Executive Director of the Global Business Coalition (led by Ambassador Richard Holbrooke) and in the White House during the Clinton administration.

Neilson also served as Co-Chairman of Saflink, a publicly traded company in the biometric security space that was acquired by IdentiPHI.

Neilson serves on the board of directors of companies and organizations including EnviroBoard, Roozt, invested.in, Goodchime, the Desmond Tutu Peace Foundation, and the Massachusetts General Hospital Center for Global Health
